#summary Build Tools

= Build Tools =

== Dependency ==

[CheckoutSource].


== Bourne Shell CLI ==

eg.

{{{
% cd $HOME/work/project/pdf-pub-tools/trunk
% ant clean deploy
}}}

The runtime items (eg. scripts, libraries) are built and deployed to the "deploy" folder.

== Eclipse IDE ==

   * Import pdf-pub-tools project into Eclipse IDE as an existing Java project.
   * Build project.
